name: FNaF Security Breach Online for android
name_original: FNaF Security Breach Online for android
description: In Five Nights at Freddy's: Security Breach, you follow the fate of the boy Gregory, who was locked up for the night in Freddy Fazbear's Mega Pizza Plex. Gregory will have to enlist the help of Freddie himself in order to uncover the secrets of the pizza plex
